txt.en: 'You struck at the right time, now they will need to grow their forces before attempting to claim Glimmerdeep once again.'

'The forces in Glimmerdeep have been weakened and are in disarray, but several leaders vie for control. We must strike before they're able to organize. The resources contained within the mine are far too valuable to wait any longer.

'I don't think I'd be able to provide much assistance, would you go to Glimmerdeep for me?'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
'There is no better time than right now to strike Glimmerdeep!'

At the foot of the Thrumfall, lay the fabled Silver-rich cavern-delving Glimmerdeep from which Durin's folk prized gemstones not seen anywhere else in the world.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to to Stráhek the Stout in Skarháld and let him know of your victory at Glimmerdeep.
